Social Studies Chapter 2 - Wednesday, Nov 5th (Pages 45-82)
Math - Topic 5 - Tuesday, Nov 11th
Grammar Workshop - Unit 2 - NOUNS (L9-14) - Thursday, Nov 13th

Social Studies

The social Studies test is TOMORROW!

I created a Blooket that is very similar to the test!

https://play.blooket.com/play?hwId=690a05724e73cc8dc26d3c6e

Please try to play until you get the questions correct.

Also, please remember the skills people need for jobs and your future job.

World Heritage Day â€“ Ireland Project Update

Today in class you worked in your groups to plan your World Heritage Day project about Ireland. Great start, everyone!

For homework, please research your topic further and start thinking of fun, interactive ways to make your groupâ€™s activity exciting for visitors. Rememberâ€”each group should have:

Something to teach (1â€“2 minutes on your topic)
An activity (3â€“4 minutes) that visitors can try

Some students mentioned they have a foam board at homeâ€”if you do, you can bring it to school to help make your display. Posters, photos, and decorations will make your booth stand out.

This project is very important and will count as a big part of your Social Studies grade for Quarter 2.

World Heritage Day is on November 20th, so we do not have much time left. Please make sure you are preparing and coming to class ready with new ideas to share.

Letâ€™s make Ireland proud! ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡ª
